General.Name: Beijing Sanyuan Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Sanyuan Foods Co., Ltd. produces, processes, and sells dairy products, cold drinks, beverages, and food products in China. It offers liquid milk, yogurt, milk powder, cheese, ice cream, and vegetable spread. The company also produces dairy and food machinery; and bioengineering technology products. In addition, the company is involved in catering and transportation of self-produced product businesses. Further, the company engages in installation, repair, leasing of dairy machinery and equipment, as well as information consultation, and property management businesses. Additionally, it offers conference; educational consultation; exhibition ticketing agency; freight, and cargo transportation services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 8 Yinghai Yingchang Street, Beijing, China, 100163
